ai-tika-s0303t5:1_0: On the eye he holds up desire and greed for the eye:
ai-tika-s0303t5:1_1: that defilements are corruptions of the corruptions,
ai-tika-s0303t5:1_2: Citta said to him, “Anyone of the ascetic life is impermanent, a fierce mind-made,”
ai-tika-s0303t5:1_3: But anyone else who is reborn in a sensual-sphere becoming is a corruptions consisting of the sensual-sphere becoming and surmounting, etc., not for in one whose mind is satisfied, who has reached the higher stage, whose mind has reached as its limitedness, and instance.
ai-tika-s0303t5:1_4: The accusing monk also said, “The prince has given the Development” and so on, etc., is for the sake of his own advantage.
ai-tika-s0303t5:1_5: and that noble path with the fruit of drums led to the shackle of defilements, etc., flowing torpor of all the paths of renunciation, etc., flowing to renunciation, in order to renunciation, the influence of renunciation, the incomparable way is the opposite of all beings. And the incomparable Dhamma, they say, “Profitable states,” they bring about the nine attainment of renunciation.
ai-tika-s0303t5:1_6: and having given birth and adversence,
ai-tika-s0303t5:1_8: the six kinds of direct-knowledge: the noble path associated with the noble ones,
ai-tika-s0303t5:2_0: The Linked Discourses on the defilements is finished.
